translations.chinese: 太史公讀秦記，至犬戎敗幽王，周東徙洛邑，秦襄公始封為諸侯，作西畤用事上帝，僭端見矣。
translations.english: When the Grand Historian read the Qin records, reaching the point where the Quanrong defeated King You and Zhou moved east to Luoyi, Duke Xiang of Qin was first enfeoffed as a feudal lord, built the Western Altar to serve the Supreme Deity—the first signs of presumption appeared.

context.next: 《禮》曰：「天子祭天地，諸侯祭其域內名山大川。」

translations.chinese: 《禮》曰：「天子祭天地，諸侯祭其域內名山大川。」
translations.english: The Rites say: 'The Son of Heaven sacrifices to Heaven and Earth, feudal lords sacrifice to the famous mountains and great rivers within their domains.'

context.previous: 太史公讀秦記，至犬戎敗幽王，周東徙洛邑，秦襄公始封為諸侯，作西畤用事上帝，僭端見矣。
context.next: 今秦雜戎翟之俗，先暴戾，後仁義，位在藩臣而臚於郊祀，君子懼焉。

translations.chinese: 今秦雜戎翟之俗，先暴戾，後仁義，位在藩臣而臚於郊祀，君子懼焉。
translations.english: Now Qin mixed the customs of the Rong and Di, putting violence and tyranny first, benevolence and righteousness after. Though positioned as a vassal minister, they performed suburban sacrifices—the gentlemen were alarmed.

context.previous: 《禮》曰：「天子祭天地，諸侯祭其域內名山大川。」
context.next: 及文公踰隴，攘夷狄，尊陳寶，營岐雍之閒，而穆公修政，東竟至河，則與齊桓、晉文中國侯伯侔矣。

translations.chinese: 及文公踰隴，攘夷狄，尊陳寶，營岐雍之閒，而穆公修政，東竟至河，則與齊桓、晉文中國侯伯侔矣。
translations.english: When Duke Wen crossed the Long mountains, drove back the Yi and Di barbarians, honored Chen Bao, and camped between Qi and Yong, Duke Mu repaired his government, his eastern border reached the Yellow River, and thus he equaled the central states' feudal lords like Duke Huan of Qi and Duke Wen of Jin.

context.previous: 今秦雜戎翟之俗，先暴戾，後仁義，位在藩臣而臚於郊祀，君子懼焉。
context.next: 是後陪臣執政，大夫世祿，六卿擅晉權，征伐會盟，威重於諸侯。

translations.chinese: 是後陪臣執政，大夫世祿，六卿擅晉權，征伐會盟，威重於諸侯。
translations.english: After this, attendants took charge of government, grand officers held hereditary stipends, the six ministers monopolized Jin's power, conducting campaigns and alliances, their authority greater than the feudal lords.

context.previous: 及文公踰隴，攘夷狄，尊陳寶，營岐雍之閒，而穆公修政，東竟至河，則與齊桓、晉文中國侯伯侔矣。
context.next: 及田常殺簡公而相齊國，諸侯晏然弗討，海內爭於戰功矣。

translations.chinese: 及田常殺簡公而相齊國，諸侯晏然弗討，海內爭於戰功矣。
translations.english: When Tian Chang killed Duke Jian and became chancellor of Qi, the feudal lords were complacently undisturbed, all under Heaven contended for military achievements.

context.previous: 是後陪臣執政，大夫世祿，六卿擅晉權，征伐會盟，威重於諸侯。
context.next: 三國終之卒分晉，田和亦滅齊而有之，六國之盛自此始。

translations.chinese: 三國終之卒分晉，田和亦滅齊而有之，六國之盛自此始。
translations.english: The three states finally divided Jin, Tian He also extinguished Qi and possessed it—the flourishing of the six states began from this time.

context.previous: 及田常殺簡公而相齊國，諸侯晏然弗討，海內爭於戰功矣。
context.next: 務在彊兵并敵，謀詐用而從衡短長之說起。

translations.chinese: 務在彊兵并敵，謀詐用而從衡短長之說起。
translations.english: Their efforts were devoted to strengthening troops and uniting against enemies, and the sayings of scheming, deception, and the vertical and horizontal alliances of long and short arose from this.

context.previous: 三國終之卒分晉，田和亦滅齊而有之，六國之盛自此始。
context.next: 矯稱蜂出，誓盟不信，雖置質剖符猶不能約束也。

translations.chinese: 矯稱蜂出，誓盟不信，雖置質剖符猶不能約束也。
translations.english: False pretenses swarmed like bees, oaths and covenants were not trusted, even placing hostages and splitting tallies could not bind them.

context.previous: 務在彊兵并敵，謀詐用而從衡短長之說起。
context.next: 秦始小國僻遠，諸夏賓之，比於戎翟，至獻公之後常雄諸侯。

translations.chinese: 秦始小國僻遠，諸夏賓之，比於戎翟，至獻公之後常雄諸侯。
translations.english: Qin began as a small, remote country, the various Xia treated it as a guest, compared it to the Rong and Di, until after Duke Xian it constantly dominated the feudal lords.

context.previous: 矯稱蜂出，誓盟不信，雖置質剖符猶不能約束也。
context.next: 論秦之德義不如魯衛之暴戾者，量秦之兵不如三晉之彊也，然卒并天下，非必險固便形勢利也，蓋若天所助焉。

translations.chinese: 論秦之德義不如魯衛之暴戾者，量秦之兵不如三晉之彊也，然卒并天下，非必險固便形勢利也，蓋若天所助焉。
translations.english: Discussing Qin's virtue and righteousness as inferior to the violent tyranny of Lu and Wei, measuring Qin's troops as not as strong as the three Jins, yet in the end it united all under Heaven—not necessarily because of dangerous fortifications, convenient terrain, or advantageous positions, but rather as if Heaven assisted it.

context.previous: 秦始小國僻遠，諸夏賓之，比於戎翟，至獻公之後常雄諸侯。

translations.chinese: 或曰「東方物所始生，西方物之成孰」。
translations.english: Some say 'Eastern things begin life there, western things mature there.'

context.next: 夫作事者必於東南，收功實者常於西北。

translations.chinese: 夫作事者必於東南，收功實者常於西北。
translations.english: Those who initiate affairs must do so in the southeast, those who gather actual merit are constantly in the northwest.

context.previous: 或曰「東方物所始生，西方物之成孰」。
context.next: 故禹興於西羌，湯起於亳，周之王也以豐鎬伐殷，秦之帝用雍州興，漢之興自蜀漢。

translations.chinese: 故禹興於西羌，湯起於亳，周之王也以豐鎬伐殷，秦之帝用雍州興，漢之興自蜀漢。
translations.english: Thus Yu rose from the Western Qiang, Tang arose from Bo, Zhou's kings used Feng and Hao to attack Yin, Qin's emperors used Yong province to rise, Han's rise came from Shu and Han.

context.previous: 夫作事者必於東南，收功實者常於西北。

translations.chinese: 秦既得意，燒天下詩書，諸侯史記尤甚，為其有所刺譏也。
translations.english: Qin, having achieved its ambitions, burned the poems and documents of all under Heaven, the feudal lords' historical records especially so, because they contained criticisms.

context.next: 詩書所以復見者，多藏人家，而史記獨藏周室，以故滅。

translations.chinese: 詩書所以復見者，多藏人家，而史記獨藏周室，以故滅。
translations.english: The reason the poems and documents reappeared was that many were hidden in people's homes, but the historical records were stored only in the Zhou court, so they were destroyed.

context.previous: 秦既得意，燒天下詩書，諸侯史記尤甚，為其有所刺譏也。
context.next: 惜哉，惜哉！

translations.english: Alas, alas!

context.previous: 詩書所以復見者，多藏人家，而史記獨藏周室，以故滅。
context.next: 獨有秦記，又不載日月，其文略不具。

translations.chinese: 獨有秦記，又不載日月，其文略不具。
translations.english: Only the Qin records remained, but they did not record dates and months, their text was brief and incomplete.

context.previous: 惜哉，惜哉！
context.next: 然戰國之權變亦有可頗采者，何必上古。

translations.chinese: 然戰國之權變亦有可頗采者，何必上古。
translations.english: Yet the stratagems and changes of the Warring States also have much worth adopting—why must it be ancient times?

context.previous: 獨有秦記，又不載日月，其文略不具。
context.next: 秦取天下多暴，然世異變，成功大。

translations.chinese: 秦取天下多暴，然世異變，成功大。
translations.english: Qin took the world with much violence, yet eras change, great success was achieved.

context.previous: 然戰國之權變亦有可頗采者，何必上古。
context.next: 傳曰「法後王」，何也？

translations.english: The tradition says 'Follow later kings,' why is that?

context.previous: 秦取天下多暴，然世異變，成功大。
context.next: 以其近己而俗變相類，議卑而易行也。

translations.chinese: 以其近己而俗變相類，議卑而易行也。
translations.english: Because they are close to us and their customs and changes are similar, their doctrines are humble and easy to implement.

context.previous: 傳曰「法後王」，何也？
context.next: 學者牽於所聞，見秦在帝位日淺，不察其終始，因舉而笑之，不敢道，此與以耳食無異。

translations.chinese: 學者牽於所聞，見秦在帝位日淺，不察其終始，因舉而笑之，不敢道，此與以耳食無異。
translations.english: Scholars are constrained by what they have heard, seeing Qin in the imperial position for few days, not examining its beginning and end, so they laugh at it, not daring to discuss it—this is no different from eating with the ears.

context.previous: 以其近己而俗變相類，議卑而易行也。
context.next: 悲夫！

translations.english: How lamentable!

context.previous: 學者牽於所聞，見秦在帝位日淺，不察其終始，因舉而笑之，不敢道，此與以耳食無異。

translations.chinese: 余於是因秦記，踵春秋之後，起周元王，表六國時事，訖二世，凡二百七十年，著諸所聞興壞之端。
translations.english: I therefore followed the Qin records, continued after the Spring and Autumn Annals, beginning from King Yuan of Zhou, chronicled the affairs of the six states, ending with the Second Emperor, altogether 270 years, recording the causes of rise and fall that I have heard.

context.next: 後有君子，以覽觀焉。

translations.english: May future gentlemen use this to observe and reflect.

context.previous: 余於是因秦記，踵春秋之後，起周元王，表六國時事，訖二世，凡二百七十年，著諸所聞興壞之端。

四十四。秦虜王建。秦滅齊。
二十七更命河為「德水」。為金人十二。命民曰「黔首」。同天下書。分為三十六郡。

translations.chinese: 二十七更命河為「德水」。為金人十二。命民曰「黔首」。同天下書。分為三十六郡。
translations.english: Twenty-seven changed named He river 'De Water'. Made twelve gold men. Commanded people called 'Qian Shou'. Unified all under heaven writing. Divided into thirty-six jun.

rowCells: 二十七更命河為「德水」。為金人十二。命民曰「黔首」。同天下書。分為三十六郡。
二十八為阿房宮。之衡山。治馳道。帝之琅邪，道南郡入。為太極廟。賜戶三十，爵一級。

translations.chinese: 二十八為阿房宮。之衡山。治馳道。帝之琅邪，道南郡入。為太極廟。賜戶三十，爵一級。
translations.english: Twenty-eight made E Pang Palace. Went to Heng Shan. Repaired chariot roads. Emperor went to Lang Ya, passed Nan Jun entered. Made Tai Ji temple. Granted households thirty, rank one level.

rowCells: 二十八為阿房宮。之衡山。治馳道。帝之琅邪，道南郡入。為太極廟。賜戶三十，爵一級。
二十九郡縣大索十日。帝之琅邪，道上黨入。

translations.chinese: 二十九郡縣大索十日。帝之琅邪，道上黨入。
translations.english: Twenty-nine jun xian great search ten days. Emperor went to Lang Ya, passed Shang Dang entered.

rowCells: 二十九郡縣大索十日。帝之琅邪，道上黨入。
三十一更命臘曰「嘉平」。賜黔首里六石米二羊，以嘉平。大索二十日。

translations.chinese: 三十一更命臘曰「嘉平」。賜黔首里六石米二羊，以嘉平。大索二十日。
translations.english: Thirty-one changed named La 'Jia Ping'. Granted Qian Shou li six dan rice two sheep, with Jia Ping. Great search twenty days.

rowCells: 三十一更命臘曰「嘉平」。賜黔首里六石米二羊，以嘉平。大索二十日。
三十二帝之碣石，道上郡入。

translations.chinese: 三十二帝之碣石，道上郡入。
translations.english: Thirty-two emperor went to Jie Shi, passed Shang Jun entered.

rowCells: 三十二帝之碣石，道上郡入。
三十三遣諸逋亡及賈人贅婿略取陸梁，為桂林、南海、象郡，以適戍。西北取戎為三十四縣。築長城河上，蒙恬將三十萬。

translations.chinese: 三十三遣諸逋亡及賈人贅婿略取陸梁，為桂林、南海、象郡，以適戍。西北取戎為三十四縣。築長城河上，蒙恬將三十萬。
translations.english: Thirty-three sent various fugitives and merchants concubine sons to plunder take Lu Liang, made Gui Lin, Nan Hai, Xiang jun, for garrisoning. Northwest took Rong made thirty-four xian. Built long wall He river, Meng Tian led thirty thousand.

rowCells: 三十三遣諸逋亡及賈人贅婿略取陸梁，為桂林、南海、象郡，以適戍。西北取戎為三十四縣。築長城河上，蒙恬將三十萬。
三十四適治獄不直者築長城。取南方越地。覆獄故失。

translations.chinese: 三十四適治獄不直者築長城。取南方越地。覆獄故失。
translations.english: Thirty-four sent handled prison unjust ones built long wall. Took southern Yue land. Reversed prison old losses.

rowCells: 三十四適治獄不直者築長城。取南方越地。覆獄故失。
三十五為直道，道九原，通甘泉。

translations.chinese: 三十五為直道，道九原，通甘泉。
translations.english: Thirty-five made straight road, road Jiu Yuan, connected Gan Quan.

rowCells: 三十五為直道，道九原，通甘泉。
三十六徙民於北河、榆中，耐徙三處，拜爵一級。石畫下東郡，有文言「地分。」

translations.chinese: 三十六徙民於北河、榆中，耐徙三處，拜爵一級。石畫下東郡，有文言「地分。」
translations.english: Thirty-six moved people to Bei He, Yu Zhong, endured moved three places, bestowed rank one level. Stone carved under Dong Jun, had writing 'Land divided.'

rowCells: 三十六徙民於北河、榆中，耐徙三處，拜爵一級。石畫下東郡，有文言「地分。」
三十七十月，帝之會稽、琅邪，還至沙丘崩。子胡亥立，為二世皇帝。殺蒙恬。道九原入。復行錢。

translations.chinese: 三十七十月，帝之會稽、琅邪，還至沙丘崩。子胡亥立，為二世皇帝。殺蒙恬。道九原入。復行錢。
translations.english: Thirty-seven tenth month, emperor went to Hui Ji, Lang Ya, returned to Sha Qiu collapsed. Son Hu Hai established, became Er Shi emperor. Killed Meng Tian. Road Jiu Yuan entered. Again circulated coin.

rowCells: 三十七十月，帝之會稽、琅邪，還至沙丘崩。子胡亥立，為二世皇帝。殺蒙恬。道九原入。復行錢。
二世元年十月戊寅，大赦罪人。十一月，為兔園。十二月，就阿房宮。其九月，郡縣皆反。楚兵至戲，章邯擊卻之。出衛君角為庶人。

translations.chinese: 二世元年十月戊寅，大赦罪人。十一月，為兔園。十二月，就阿房宮。其九月，郡縣皆反。楚兵至戲，章邯擊卻之。出衛君角為庶人。
translations.english: Er Shi first year tenth month Wu Yin, great amnesty criminals. Eleventh month, made Tu Yuan. Twelfth month, entered E Pang Palace. That ninth month, jun xian all rebelled. Chu troops reached Xi, Zhang Han struck repelled them. Sent out Wei Jun Jiao as commoner.

rowCells: 二世元年十月戊寅，大赦罪人。十一月，為兔園。十二月，就阿房宮。其九月，郡縣皆反。楚兵至戲，章邯擊卻之。出衛君角為庶人。
二將軍章邯、長史司馬欣、都尉董翳追楚兵至河。誅丞相斯、去疾，將軍馮劫。

translations.chinese: 二將軍章邯、長史司馬欣、都尉董翳追楚兵至河。誅丞相斯、去疾，將軍馮劫。
translations.english: Two generals Zhang Han, Chang Shi Si Ma Xin, Du Wei Dong Yi pursued Chu troops to river. Executed chancellor Si, Qu Ji, general Feng Jie.

rowCells: 二將軍章邯、長史司馬欣、都尉董翳追楚兵至河。誅丞相斯、去疾，將軍馮劫。
三趙高反，二世自殺，高立二世兄子嬰。子嬰立，剌殺高，夷三族。諸侯入秦，嬰降，為項羽所殺。尋誅羽，天下屬漢。

translations.chinese: 三趙高反，二世自殺，高立二世兄子嬰。子嬰立，剌殺高，夷三族。諸侯入秦，嬰降，為項羽所殺。尋誅羽，天下屬漢。
translations.english: Three Zhao Gao rebelled, Er Shi suicide, Gao established Er Shi younger brother Zi Ying. Zi Ying established, assassinated Gao, exterminated three clans. Feudal lords entered Qin, Ying surrendered, killed by Xiang Yu. Soon executed Yu, all under heaven belonged to Han.

rowCells: 三趙高反，二世自殺，高立二世兄子嬰。子嬰立，剌殺高，夷三族。諸侯入秦，嬰降，為項羽所殺。尋誅羽，天下屬漢。
